mapper.select: SELECT reservNo, userId, itemId, realtorId, visitDate, visitTime, confirm FROM VISITORRESERV where itemId=#{itemId}
select itemId, roomType, roomFloor, area, supplyArea, roomDirection, heating, availableDate, rooms, bathrooms from ROOMINFO where itemId = #{itemId}
select realtorId, realtorName, realtorPhone from REALTOR where realtorId=#{realtorId}
SELECT r.realtorName, r.realtorPhone FROM REALTOR r JOIN VISITORRESERV v ON r.realtorId = v.realtorId WHERE v.itemId = #{itemId} AND r.realtorId = #{realtorId}

SELECT i.itemId, i.addrDetail, u.visitDate, u.visitTime, r.realtorName, r.realtorPhone, u.CONFIRM FROM VISITORRESERV u JOIN Listing i ON u.itemId = i.itemId JOIN REALTOR r ON u.realtorId = r.realtorId WHERE u.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY u.visitDate DESC, u.visitTime DESC
